title: Little Adventures
description: Little Adventures is a collection of 3 short stories that is intended to introduce good morals to young children. In each story, the author uses delightful animal characters to demonstrate real-life situations, which children may gradually encounter while growing up.This book presents lessons in comparing yourself to others, treating others with kindness and the importance of sharing, which makes it a valuable resource for primary school teachers and parents.
author: Michelle Ragoonanan-Ali
